attributes.action: Cap MP’s salary to National Minimum Wage
attributes.background: MP’s are currently paid in excess of £70k a year, this is unacceptable. The government is ‘out of touch’ with the British people and need to understand how hard it actually is to live in the UK on National Minimum Wage. This petition calls on the government to cap MP’s pay to Minimum Wage.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
